contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 16, 1997 D Pilkington Northern Open (Section D)
Northern Open (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Northern Open wilkinson-northern-open-section-d
Test Piece Contest
Little Suite for Brass [Arnold]
Theatre Royal, St. Helens Information taken from contest programme.
The 2003 programme 'Roll of Honour' has errors in its Section D list; the 1995 winner (Porthywaen) is listed as winning in 1996, while the 1996 winner (Slaithwaite) is listed as winning in 1997.
April 7, 2013, 6:24 a.m. Dec. 8, 2014, 2:35 p.m.
